r.d: Native implementations of common message digest algorithms using a generic factory method
r.n:
Fixed PECL bug #6183 - haval source file entries missing in package.xml
Supported Algorithms: * md4, md5 * sha1, sha256, sha384, sha512 * ripemd128, ripemd160 * tiger128, tiger160, tiger192 (3 and 4 passes) * haval128, haval160, haval192, haval224, haval256 (3, 4 and 5 passes) * crc32, crc32b, adler32, gost, snefru, whirlpool
